goal.en: "- Learning earthquake records and their applications for engineering purpose - Understanding factors of earthquake and strong ground motion - Introducing seismic hazard assessments and its applications - Assessing seismic hazard assessment practically"
goal.ch: "- 地震紀錄及工程地震上之應用 - 地震及強地動之基礎概念 - 地震危害分析及其應用 - 地震危害分析實作"

content.en:
"- An introduction of seismic hazard assessment
- Magnitude and intensity scales
- Seismic records: historical and instrumental records
- Seismotetonic sources
- The maximum magnitudes of earthquakes
- Earthquake strong ground motion
- Deterministic and probabilistic seismic hazard assessments
- Seismic hazard assessment through the ‘OPENQUAKE’ software"
content.ch:
"- 地震危害分析及課程介紹
- 地震規模及震度
- 地震紀錄：歷史文獻紀錄及儀器紀錄
- 孕震構造
- 最大地震規模
- 強地動評估
- 定值式與概率式地震危害分析
- 利用「OPENQUAKE」程式計算地震危害"
